title: Sudeep Joins Star-Studded Cast of KD – The Devil | Director Prem Confirms
summary: Backed by KVN Productions, KD – The Devil is being made on a massive budget, with Arjun Janya composing the music.

body.raw:
## Backed by KVN Productions KD – The Devil is being made on a massive budget, with Arjun Janya composing the music. The film is not only set to push the boundaries of Kannada cinema but is also being positioned as a pan-India release, with dubbed versions planned in Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, and Malayalam. The movie is said to explore themes of power, vengeance, and rebellion, with high-octane action sequences designed by international stunt choreographers. The makers are leaving no stone unturned to create a visually grand cinematic experience.
![Maple](/static/images/article-4/image413.webp)
![Lake](/static/images/article-4/image411.jpg)
